query:
ALTER TABLE evidenceSubTemplates 
ADD COLUMN targetAudience ENUM('all', 'stage', 'subject', 'stage_subject') DEFAULT 'all' NOT NULL AFTER orderIndex,
ADD COLUMN stages JSON AFTER targetAudience,
ADD COLUMN subjects JSON AFTER stages,
ADD COLUMN grades JSON AFTER subjects;
